title.narrative: Agribusiness Partnership Project in Papua New Guinea, PNG: Support to Development of Cassava farm production and Supply Chain Linkages

description.narrative: This project has been originated and triggered by a series of discussions with Heineken as part of the partnership with UNIDO. An of ficial letter dated 24 June 2016 was received from Office of the Secretary - Ministry of Trade Commerce and Industry, Government of Papua New Guinea (PNG), inviting partnership with UNIDO. The project aim is to support the sourcing of raw material (cassava starch as an intermediary raw material and food commodity) for private sector industries within the country. Enclosed to the official Government of PNG request letter inviting partnership with UNIDO, South Pacific Breweries (SPB) has prepared a note clarifying the project objective as discussed with UNIDO in the framework of the partnership agreement with Heineken, where SPB has coordinated a number of country-level preparatory activities by the value chain partners (Department of Agriculture and Livestock, research institutions and SPB) in 2015 and 2016.
